bib.title: Selected papers from the CLARIN Annual Conference 2017, Budapest, 18--20 September 2017
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: CLARIN ERIC (http://clarin. eu) is the European Research Infrastructure for Language Resources and Technology aimed at supporting researchers mostly from the domain of Social Sciences and Humanities (SS&H) in their use of language data and technologies. CLARIN works towards lowering barriers in doing research in those areas by offering widespread, advanced, userfriendly and effective applications giving access to language resources and enabling the analysis of textual data, speech recordings, as well as
bib.publisher: Link{\"o}ping University Electronic Press, Link{\"o}pings universitet
